text: ClearDATA is hiring Dev Ops, Sys Admins and Security Engineers in Austin, TX. ClearDATA is the nation’s fastest growing healthcare cloud computing company. More than 310,000 healthcare professionals rely on ClearDATA’s HIPAA compliant cloud computing HealthDATA (TM) platform and infrastructure to store, manage, protect, and share their patient data and critical applications. Email me if interested jessica.radachy@cleardata.com
